message: Let's start fair, I'm offering you a good share.  What do you think?
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bit more. What do you think?
I understand you want more, but this is my final offer. We both get more than last round, and this way we can finally split the money.
I'm getting desperate, but I think I can still get a better deal. I'm willing to take a smaller share if it means getting more than in the previous rounds. Your last chance, Alice!
